explains: v. 干预，干涉；插话，打岔；干扰，阻挠；发生于其间，介于中间；调停，斡旋
wordGroup: intervene in 干预；插手；调停

sentences.en: The problem lies in deciding when to intervene.
sentences.cn: 问题在于决定何时介入。

sentences.en: We may have to intervene militarily in the area.
sentences.cn: 我们可能只好对这一地区进行军事干涉。

sentences.en: The security forces had to intervene to prevent the situation worsening.
sentences.cn: 那些安全部队不得不干预以阻止形势变得更糟。
